thread.title: Coll hotel with great service. felt a little sterile without a restaurant
thread.title_full: Coll hotel with great service. felt a little sterile without a restaurant - Review of Andaz Wall Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Izzy D
title: Coll hotel with great service. felt a little sterile without a restaurant
text: The rooms were awesome and all the lights/plugs worked (which should not be taken for granted). no issues checking in or checking out plus great location for Uber pick up. Bit tough to find a restaurant after hours for fine dining that wasn't very old. bar was cool with a good selection
